column5: There are 3 spacious bedrooms to rent separately ($100 each per night), a nice TV room, 1 1/2 bathrooms, a gourmet kitchen, and even a nice swing at the backyard to enjoy your morning coffee! Grocery stores, Katy Mills Outlet, and a wide variety of great restaurants may be reached in less than 10 minutes. Gorgeous walking trails, beautiful lakes, great pools, tennis courts make Cinco Ranch a great place!
column8: Single Rooms in a Cozy House
